title: The Waiting
author: Claire, Regi
snippet: Not the least bit interested  in me as a woman. But he hailed from Kelso like myself and  would tell me stories about Floors Castle, where he'd worked as  a landscape gardener before being appointed head gardener at  the Astley Ainslie Hospital round the corner from here. He and his  best friend Julian, heir to a biscuit empire, were good customers  at our shop.
